name: Brown Upcycled Pop Tab Clutch
description:
Think Green!!

This posting is for a brown upcycled pop tab clutch

Approximately 140 pop tabs were used to make this upcycled eco-friendly clutch. The pop tabs were thoroughly inspected and cleaned for quality purposes. I crocheted the pop tabs together with nylon thread for durability.

Clutch Approximate Dimensions:
Height 5" / Width: 8"

SHIPPING (ITEM IS READY TO SHIP)
This item ships within 24-48 hours via USPS with delivery confirmation.

CUSTOM ORDERS
I accept custom orders! Contact me if you'd like a specific color.
